titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse, concerning the power of the Peeres, and Commons of Parliament, in point of judicature written by a learned antiquerie, at the request of a peere, of this realme.
titleStmt.author: Selden, John, 1584-1654.

publicationStmt.date: printed in the yeere, that sea-coale was exceeding deare, 1640.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Selden by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
